text: The Hessian Renegades is a 1909 American silent war drama movie directed by D. W. Griffith1776; or, The Hessian RenegadesPeter T. Lubrecht. New Jersey Hessians: Truth and Lore in the American Revolution and stars Owen Moore, Linda Arvidson, and Kate Bruce. ==Actors== * Owen Moore as American Soldier * Linda Arvidson as Farmer * Kate Bruce as Soldier's Family * William J. Butler as Farmer * Verner Clarges as Farmer * D. W. Griffith * Robert Harron as Farmer * Arthur V. Johnson as Hessian * James Kirkwood as Soldier's Family * Florence Lawrence * Marion Leonard * Wilfred Lucas ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:1900s war movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Hessian Renegades
